about_the_game:
The official “Two Worlds” album presents the stirring music from the RPG - including the title song “Play the Game”, sung by the charismatic voice of Kyra - and you get various remix versions too. Composed by the famous Harold Faltermeyer and played by the musicians of the MGM Grand Orchestra, this new arranged mix of Gothic, classical, rock and folk will transport you into a fantastic world!
